lines: #GO ON A DATE/HAVE AN EXPERIENCE WITH YOUR PRESENT PARTNER
I'm sorry, but you don't have a relationship right now.
There are none of these experiences you can do right now.

According to your past relationship behavior, you are involved in a serious relationship. Choosing to continue from here means that you are willing to cheat on your present partner, risk losing him and suffer the emotional consequences
of the breakup. Do you want to continue?
Where would you like to meet this person?
*comment @SLS|He does volunteer work at a local hospital.|His jogging route takes him right past your home.|He manages a stationery store in town.|
*set dss "He does volunteer work at a local hospital."
*set dss "His jogging route takes him right past your home."
*set dss "He manages a stationery store in town."
*comment @SLS|He is in charge of the Senior Citizen's Club.|He is a famous comic who works in nightclub you visit.|He was a guest at a cocktail party you recently attended.|
*set dss "He is in charge of the Senior Citizen's Club."
*set dss "He is a famous comic who works in nightclub you visit."
*set dss "He was a guest at a cocktail party you recently attended."
*comment @SLS|He placed a classified ad in a local newspaper.|He walked right up to you at the grocery store and asked you for a date.|He was introduced to you by a close friend.|
*set dss "He placed a classified ad in a local newspaper."
*set dss "He walked right up to you at the grocery store and asked you for a date."
*set dss "He was introduced to you by a close friend."
Whom would you like to meet?
You have chosen to meet with ${loverName}. His characteristics may be described as follows:
You meet ${loverName} in the following way:
After meeting him, the two of you discuss the possibility of a date.
Unfortunately, you don't have the social skills necessary to convince this person that you are worth going out with.
The two of you agree that it might be nice to spend some time together.
Unfortunately, this person is not as interested in you as he first seemed.
Your husband finds out you have been "on the prowl" and leaves you.
Your husband doesn't find out about this relationship (for now).
You were caught trying to weasel your way into another relationship.
Your old boyfriend dumps you. Now you have no one!
Both men dump you. Now you have no one!
Your old boyfriend dumps you. You still have ${loverName}.
You're obviously upset and confused! You don't have a boyfriend to break up with.
Even though you have chosen to break off this relationship, it will still have an impact on you personally. Please check the status screen to see what adjustments have been made.
You don't even have a boyfriend!
You already have a steady partner!
You and ${loverName} make a handsome couple.
${loverName} doesn't want to get serious right now. Sorry.
Didn't you notice the other toothbrush and the extra laundry? You are already living together!
It would probably be a better idea if you were at least going steady first.
What? Are you kidding? BEING MARRIED AND LIVING TOGETHER WITH SOMEONE AT THE SAME TIME?? Your Physical sphere is not strong enough to manage an arrangement like this!
After thinking it over, the two of you agree to move in together.
${loverName} feels he really doesn't think he could do this right now; he just isn't ready to give up his privacy.
